roleset.name: to make timid, fill with fear, causing fear/timidity in
roleset.note: INTIMIDATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'intimidate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus; adjectival 'timid' based on BOLT-6. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1 (from intimidate.01-v)
INTIMIDATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT DF07. Framed by Claire. (from intimidation.01-n)
INTIMIDATING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from intimidating.01-j)

example.name: intimidate-v: transitive
example.text: Congress learned during the Reagan administration that it could intimidate the executive branch by [*-1] uttering again and again the same seven words : `` Provided , that no funds shall be spent [*-48]... . ''
example.arg: by [*-1] uttering again and again the same seven words : `` Provided , that no funds shall be spent [*-48]

example.name: intimidation-n: All args
example.text: His modus operandi was evident in violent attacks on three individuals, and his intimidation of anyone who dared to speak to the police.
example.arg: of anyone who dared to speak to the police.
